title: NotHatinJustTrollin
author: NotHatinJustTrollin
content: Hi, i want to create a topic talk about "Recent Private Fundraising Activities Among Blockchain Startups".So, Which category should I create a topic? Altcoin Discussion ?Please check my picture design.A Questions: My picture have tag my group "BlackReport" , any problem if when spreading them in the forum , if not can i remove them.Thanks !

comments.author: newIndia
comments.body: This thread itself belongs to Meta.And yes. The thread you want to create belongs to Altcoin Discussion.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: NotHatinJustTrollin on April 15, 2023, 05:45:24 PMPlease check my picture design.A Questions: My picture have tag my group "BlackReport" , any problem if when spreading them in the forum , if not can i remove them.If you can't remove it and you feel you'll be punished for plagiarism then just copy the link and add it at the bottom of your post. As for where to make your post, if it's not related to Bitcoin then you should make it in altcoins discussion but if it's about Bitcoin then you should consider making it in Bitcoin discussion board.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: NotHatinJustTrollin on April 15, 2023, 05:45:24 PMMy picture have tag my group "BlackReport" , any problem if when spreading them in the forum , if not can i remove them.I don't see a problem with it. If that's how the original image was designed you an freely share it that way without violating any of the rules.
